articles.title: Mexico’s president says she rejected Trump’s plan to send US troops across the border - AP News
articles.description: Mexico's president has said that U.S. President Donald Trump proposed sending American troops into Mexico to help her administration fight drug trafficking but that she rejected it. The remarks by Claudia Sheinbaum came in response to a Wall Street Journal ar…
articles.content: MEXICO CITY (AP) Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Saturday that U.S. President Donald Trump proposed sending American troops into Mexico to help her administration fight drug trafficking b… [+2172 chars]
